title: Vision in mathematics: relations
creator_credit: Robert Newton and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: Opens up with images of Ron Clarke, Donald Campbell and Jack Brabham. Displays the symbols used for expressing familiar mathematical relationships to raise the question of how such relationships can be expressed. Discusses and illustrates several methods of notation.
